content.question: Based on the information given, which of the following conclusions is possible for the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> in the <math alttext="x y"> <mi>x</mi> <mi>y</mi> </math>-plane?

choices.label: The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has an <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-intercept at <math alttext="x equals negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.
The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has a hole at <math alttext="x equals negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.
The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has a vertical asymptote at <math alttext="x equals negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.
The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has a horizontal asymptote at <math alttext="y equals negative 5"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.

content.answer: The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has a vertical asymptote at <math alttext="x equals negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
